tool_description: Realtor.com offers a real-time data unofficial API that allows users to search for sale and rental(for rent) listings. As an online real estate marketplace specializing in connecting buyers, sellers, and renters across the United States
name: Realtor Base
title: Realtor Base

api_list.name: Search for rent

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description:
Default ＝ 30
**Page_size**  refers to the number of records displayed on a single page in the context of pagination.

optional_parameters.name: search_radius_in_miles
optional_parameters.description:
Keyword search
Suggested Values:
`1`, `2`, `3`, `5`,` 10`, `20`
**※** The search results can be more if the number is larger

api_list.name: Search for sale
api_list.description:
This feature enables users to specify their preferences, such as location, price range, property type, number of bedrooms, and other criteria, to narrow down their search results.

When using the "Search for sale" feature, users can enter their desired location, such as a city, state, or ZIP code, and set filters to refine their search. These filters may include property type (e.g., houses, condos, townhouses), minimum and maximum price range, square footage, and specific features or amenities they are looking for.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood

optional_parameters.name: max_year_built
optional_parameters.description:
Format: YYYY
It is displayed on the web as [**Home Age**]

optional_parameters.name: min_year_built
optional_parameters.description:
Format: YYYY
It is displayed on the web as [**Home Age**]

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description:
Please input the values below(**separated by a comma**):
`Condo`,`Multi_family_home`,`Farm`,`Single_family_home`,`Townhome`,`Mobile`,`Land`
EX:
Condo,Multi_family_home

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description:
Default ＝ 30
**Page_size**  refers to the number of records displayed on a single page in the context of pagination.

api_list.name: keywords/list

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default = 5
To increase accuracy, the keyword filter suggests the most commonly searched terms. Results may vary.

api_list.name: Auto-complete
api_list.description:
- "**area_type**":  The type of area is a city
- "**city**":  The city's name
- "**state_code**":  The state code
- "**counties**":  Located in Cameron County (name and FIPS code of the county are provided).
- "**country**": "USA" - The country is the United States.
- "**centroid**":  The centroid coordinates of the city are longitude and latitude 
- "**geo_id**":  The geographic ID
- "**county_needed_for_uniq**": There is no need for a county to determine uniqueness for this city.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood

required_parameters.name: property_id
required_parameters.description: The [**property_id**] property is obtained from the [`Search for sale`] or [`Search for rent`] API.
